query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mttr_mtbf_thresholds (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line','all') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT,
  mttr_warning_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mttr_critical_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mtbf_warning_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mtbf_critical_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability_warning_threshold DECIMAL(5, 4),
  availability_critical_threshold DECIMAL(5, 4),
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  alert_emails TEXT,
  alert_telegram INT DEFAULT 0,
  cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 60,
  last_alert_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_target_type_id (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_enabled (enabled)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mttr_mtbf_thresholds (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line','all') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT,
  mttr_warning_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mttr_critical_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mtbf_warning_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  mtbf_critical_threshold DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability_warning_threshold DECIMAL(5, 4),
  availability_critical_threshold DECIMAL(5, 4),
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  alert_emails TEXT,
  alert_telegram INT DEFAULT 0,
  cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 60,
  last_alert_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_target_type_id (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_enabled (enabled)
);
